content:
Version Identification

  • Requirement

    • URL Independent

  • Suggested Implementation

    • New Header
    • Similarity to Content-Type

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version

Notes:

    The concept that URLs represent more than one entity has a long established history. Versioning should provide no exception. Just as we provide content-type headers to allow for different versions of the same document so we should have a versioning header to identify different versions.
